editions.effect:
[Class Bonus] **Ranged 2** *(As long as this unit is **distant**, its attacks get %+1%+2% [POWER].)*

**On Enter:** You may discard a fire element card. If you do, draw a card and CARDNAME becomes **distant**. *(Units stay **distant** until the end of their controller's turn.)*
editions.effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 POWER.)

On Enter: You may discard a fire element card. If you do, draw a card and Fiery Duelist becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
